summary_short: Rodion Raskolnikov is the most connected figure (3 ties). Key relationship types: unknown relationship.
highlights: Most central: Rodion Raskolnikov (3), Alyona Ivanovna (2), Dmitri Prokofich Razumihin (1), Porfiry Petrovich (1)
story_summary: Raskolnikov learns that Lizaveta was invited by the pawnbroker Alyona Ivanovna to help sell household goods from a family in poverty. He becomes increasingly superstitious and reflects on his previous encounter with Alyona, feeling a strong aversion towards her. While at a tavern, he overhears a student discussing Alyona and her sister Lizaveta, which stirs unsettling thoughts in him about the old woman and the value of her life.
